model

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Inventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Singleton class to manage the entire Inventory system
    Author:
    Brian
    See Also:

      • nMonthSupplyMap

        private java.util.SortedMap<java.util.Date,java.util.Set<Product>> nMonthSupplyMap
        Mapping for the nMonthSupply report. The Date key represents a month. The corresponding products are those which will last up to the key's month

      • nMonthSupplyGroupMap

        private java.util.SortedMap<java.util.Date,java.util.Set<ProductGroup>> nMonthSupplyGroupMap
        Date Mapping for the nMonthSupply report. The Date key represents a month. The corresponding ProductGroups are those which will last up to the key's month

        private static Inventory instance
        Static reference to the one and only Inventory instance
